statements: SELECT user_id, user_name, total_points, last_reward_date FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT user_name, total_points, last_reward_date, user_id FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgramData ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, total_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT user_id, last_reward_date FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE last_reward_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, user_name, total_points, last_reward_date FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY last_reward_date DESC
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, user_name, total_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE total_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT user_id, user_name, total_points, last_reward_date FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE last_reward_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, user_name, total_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY total_points
SELECT * FROM frequent_users;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_users WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM frequent_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost, expiration_date FROM rewards WHERE point_cost < 50 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points FROM frequent_users WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost, expiration_date FROM rewards WHERE point_cost < 500 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM frequent_users JOIN rewards ON frequent_users.loyalty_points >= rewards.point_cost ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE point_cost BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY reward_id DESC;

SELECT user_name, loyalty_points, reward_name, expiration_date FROM frequent_users JOIN rewards ON frequent_users.loyalty_points >= rewards.point_cost WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM frequent_users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM frequent_users WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points_required FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points_required DESC;
SELECT user_name, reward_name FROM frequent_users JOIN user_rewards ON frequent_users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;

SELECT user_name, reward_name, claimed_date FROM frequent_users JOIN user_rewards ON frequent_users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM frequent_users;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points_required > 100 ORDER BY reward_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, loyalty_points FROM frequent_users WHERE loyalty_points > 5000 AND user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;

SELECT user_name, reward_name, claimed_date FROM frequent_users JOIN user_rewards ON frequent_users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id ORDER BY claimed_date ASC;

SELECT user_name, user_email, reward_name, reward_points_required FROM frequent_users JOIN user_rewards ON frequent_users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE reward_points_required BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY user_name ASC, claimed_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, loyalty_points ASC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE required_points < 500 ORDER BY required_points ASC
SELECT user_id, reward_id FROM user_rewards
SELECT * FROM users WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT email, loyalty_points FROM users WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT user_id, username, email, loyalty_points FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT u.username, r.reward_name, t.transaction_date FROM users u JOIN user_rewards ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN rewards r ON ur.reward_id = r.reward_id JOIN transactions t ON ur.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE r.required_points < 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, MAX(loyalty_points) AS max_points, MIN(loyalty_points) AS min_points FROM users
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_points FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_points ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT email, total_points FROM users WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, points_earned, transaction_date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT users.username, rewards.reward_name FROM users JOIN user_rewards ON users.user_id = user_rewards.user_id JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
